hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The omen is polytheistic deed and anyone of us may think he sees an omen but Allah will dispel it by means of relying upon Him.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ كَانَ يُعْجِبُهُ الْفَأْلُ وَيَكْرَهُ الطِّيَرَةَ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever likes good signs and dislikes omens
